CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: To understand the relationship between device performances and active layer morphology , atomic force microscopy ( AFM ) measurements were conducted to investigate the surface morphology of PSFDTBT / PC71BM blend films.

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here are the "Material Name" entities in the paragraph:

1. PSFDTBT (Polystyrene-b-dithiophene)
2. PC71BM (Phenyl-C61-butyric acid methyl ester)

So, the Material Name entities in the paragraph are "PSFDTBT" and "PC71BM".
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Of course! Here are the Material Name entities in the paragraph after removing the irrelevant entities:

1. PSFDTBT
2. PC71BM

So, the Material Name entities in the paragraph are "PSFDTBT" and "PC71BM".

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the Material Name entities in the paragraph presented as a Markdown table:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PSFDTBT |
| PC71BM |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: To understand the relationship between device performances and active layer morphology , atomic force microscopy ( AFM ) measurements were conducted to investigate the surface morphology of PSFDTBT / PC71BM blend films.

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here are the "Property Value" entities identified in the given paragraph:

1. Property: Surface morphology
Entity: Atomic force microscopy (AFM) measurements
2. Property: Device performances
Entity: Device performances and active layer morphology

In this paragraph, the author is discussing the relationship between the surface morphology of a blend film (PSFDTBT/PC71BM) and its device performances. To investigate this relationship, the author conducted AFM measurements to obtain information about the surface morphology of the blend film. Therefore, the "Property Value" entities in this paragraph are "Surface morphology" and "Device performances".
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

Of course! Here are the "Property Value" entities that clearly refer to the value of material properties in the given paragraph:

1. Property: Surface morphology
Value: The surface morphology of the blend film obtained through AFM measurements.
2. Property: Device performances
Value: The device performances and active layer morphology obtained through AFM measurements.

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.
